title: Kinetic energy change of falling cylinder

content.question: After the cylinder leaves the table, but before it lands, how do the rotational kinetic energy and translational kinetic energy of the cylinder change, if at all?

choices.label: Rotational Kinetic Energy Translational Kinetic Energy Increases Increases
Rotational Kinetic Energy Translational Kinetic Energy Increases Stays the same
Rotational Kinetic Energy Translational Kinetic Energy Stays the same Increases
Rotational Kinetic Energy Translational Kinetic Energy Stays the same Stays the same

content.answer: Rotational Kinetic Energy Translational Kinetic Energy Stays the same Increases

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
